byline.original: BY G. W. CUTTER, For The New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: A bear me forth to each distant land, And the scenes that ye so deplore--The midnight blaze, the incendiary's brand Shall ravage the world no more. Where your burning palaces light the skies Like a signal of doom and death, The flame that your utmost strength defies, I'll quench with a single breath.
